content:
Dear All,

I experimented on #10185 with an "automated deprecation" for renamed lemmas. The only change of the latest commit (94273c7) that was not generated by the script is the one on IsRorC: I added manually the line breaks in

@[deprecated ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm_bound_of_ball_bound]
alias ContinuousLinearMap.op_norm_bound_of_ball_bound :=
  ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm_bound_of_ball_bound -- deprecated on 2024/02/02

to please the long-line linter.

Other than that, if anyone has any comments or finds issues with the deprecations, please let me know!
My initial comment is that 2024/02/02 is not the ISO8601 format, which is 2024-02-02 :upside_down:
Well, that is very easy to fix! :lol:

I fixed the format of the date and I also updated the script to add more line breaks to please more often the long line linter. I force-pushed the changes so that the "automated deprecation" commit is still only one.
